segments.original: 抚琴居红楼梦文学社区发布

segments.en: Published by the Fuqinju Dream of the Red Chamber Literary Community
segments.ru: Опубликовано литературным сообществом «Сон в красном тереме» Фуциньцзюй

translator_notes: 「抚琴居」(Fuqinju) literally means 'Dwelling of Caressing the Qin' - the qin (琴) is the classical Chinese zither, symbolizing scholarly refinement
This is an online literary community dedicated to 红楼梦 scholarship and textual studies
The title page establishes this as a collaborative scholarly effort combining traditional commentary with modern collation methods
research_notes: The Fuqinju community was active in early Chinese internet forums dedicated to classical literature
Kolistan's collation work compares multiple manuscript traditions to establish the most authentic text
